block.p: Sari Genifer Neidell, the daughter of Suzan and Martin Neidell of Oyster Bay Cove, N.Y., is to be married today to Glen Daren Cohen, a son of Rita Schoen of Plainsboro, N.J., and Edwin Cohen of New York. Rabbi Darryl Crystal will officiate at the St. Regis in New York.

The bride, 27, is the registrar of paintings at the Barbara Mathes Gallery in New York. She received a bachelor's degree and a master's in art history from New York University. Her father is a partner in the New York law firm Stroock & Stroock & Lavan.

Sari Genifer Neidell, the daughter of Suzan and Martin Neidell of Oyster Bay Cove, N.Y., is to be married today to Glen Daren Cohen, a son of Rita Schoen of Plainsboro, N.J., and Edwin Cohen of New York. Rabbi Darryl Crystal will officiate at the St. Regis in New York.

The bride, 27, is the registrar of paintings at the Barbara Mathes Gallery in New York. She received a bachelor's degree and a master's in art history from New York University. Her father is a partner in the New York law firm Stroock & Stroock & Lavan.

The bridegroom, 33, is the vice president for Northeast sales and marketing at Interbank Capital Partners in New York. He graduated from Arizona State University. His father retired as the sales manager at Manor Electric Supply, a distributorship in Brooklyn.
